p: The intermediate 4 (2 mmol) reacted with isonicotinic acid hydrazide (2 mmol) in the presence of catalytic amounts of hydrochloric acid (5 drops) in ethanol (20 ml) at 70 °C for 5 h. The solution was evaporated to dryness under reduced pressure, and the residue was purified by silica gel column chromatography with (dichloromethane: methanol = 60:1).
